summary.span: 为一组命令或控件提供容器。

span.span: Provides a container for a group of commands or controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件提供一种溢出机制将不适合的项到溢出区域。 controls provide an overflow mechanism that places items that do not fit on the into an overflow area. 只有在父级工具栏元素可以移动或由用户调整大小。Only toolbar elements within a parent can be moved or resized by the user. 是，这意味着其标头和对象的集合可以是任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板）。 is a , which means its header and collection of objects can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义工具栏控件Customizing the ToolBar Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[工具栏样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/toolbar-styles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建内。The following example shows how to create a inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Band { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示工具栏应位于 中的什么位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates where the toolbar should be located in the .
The band of the in which the toolbar is positioned.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 位置中取决于的值， ，和属性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当设置为，带区表示中的行。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当是，带区表示的列。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之间的关系， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|带Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|指示在其中行定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 工具栏具有设置为较小的值将位于较大值的那些之上。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 工具栏具有左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示在其中的列定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 工具栏具有左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 工具栏具有设置为较小的值将位于较大值的那些之上。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件内。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int BandIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示工具栏在带区上的位置的带区索引号。

span.span: Gets or sets the band index number that indicates the position of the toolbar on the band.

value.span: 工具栏在 的带区上的位置。

span.span: The position of a toolbar on the band of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未显式设置此属性，其值将由的顺序中设置。If you do not explicitly set this property, its value is determined by the order in which the is set in the . 例如，如果将两个工具栏放在但不包括设置和属性、 的值将为这两个工具栏的 0。For example, if you put two toolbars in a without setting the and properties, the value of will be 0 for both toolbars. 值将 0 作为第一个工具栏，1 表示第二个工具栏。The value of will be 0 for the first toolbar and 1 for the second toolbar. 位置中取决于的值， ，和属性。The position of the in a depends on the values of the , , and properties. 当设置为，带区表示中的行。When is set to , a band represents a row in the . 当是，带区表示的列。When is , a band represents a column of the . 下表描述之间的关系， ，和。The following table describes the relationship between , , and . |方向Orientation|带Band|BandIndexBandIndex| |-----------------|----------|---------------| |水平Horizontal|指示在其中行定位。Indicates the row in which the is positioned. 工具栏具有设置为较小的值将位于较大值的那些之上。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 工具栏具有左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.| |垂直Vertical|指示在其中的列定位。Indicates the column in which the is positioned. 工具栏具有左侧的那些具有更大的值将设置为较小的值。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are to the left of those with a larger value.|指示的位置上。Indicates the position of the on the . 工具栏具有设置为较小的值将位于较大值的那些之上。Toolbars that have set to a smaller value are above those with a larger value.| ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性将控件内。The following example shows how use this property to place controls inside a . [!code-xaml[ToolBarExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolBarExample/CS/Pane1.xaml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有与它拥有的空间以显示更多的项，它将对其余的项放在其溢出区域。If a has more items than it has the space to show, it puts the remaining items in its overflow area. 用户可以单击箭头访问溢出项。The user can click the arrow on the to access the overflow items. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为在 上的某个项上按任意键时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when a key is pressed on an item in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户主页，按中的第一个项接收键盘焦点。When the user presses HOME, the first item in the receives keyboard focus. 当用户按结束时中的最后一项接收键盘焦点。When the user presses END, the last item in the receives keyboard focus. 当发生这种情况时，此实现将标记事件处理的设置属性的事件数据的`true`。When this occurs, this implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true`.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostMouseCapture(class System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnLostMouseCapture (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: The arguments for the event.

summary.span: 为 丢失鼠标捕获时发生的 路由事件提供类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现不会更改已处理的状态 (属性) 的事件数据。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果你重写，始终调用基实现你实现。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果调用基实现会使基类处理具有类处理程序，这可能会改变最终类的运行时行为的事件。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 你可以调用基实现之前或之后你特殊的处理，具体取决于你的要求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
